CustomField.formula: IF(OR(ISBLANK(Segment_crm__c), ISNULL(Segment_crm__c), Segment_crm__c == "0"), "", CASE(Segment_crm__c , "1" ,IMAGE("/resource/segment_color/segment_color/sgm01_min.svg", "MB"), "2", IMAGE("/resource/segment_color/segment_color/sgm02_min.svg", "CB"), "3", IMAGE("/resource/segment_color/segment_color/sgm03_min.svg", "BB"), "4", IMAGE("/resource/segment_color/segment_color/sgm04_min.svg", "SE"), "5", IF( OR(RTL_Privilege1__c = "WB",RTL_Privilege1__c = "PB") , IMAGE("/resource/segment_color/segment_color/sgm05_01_min.svg", "Affluent"), IMAGE("/resource/segment_color/segment_color/sgm05_02_min.svg", "Affluent") ), "6", IMAGE("/resource/segment_color/segment_color/sgm06_min.svg", "Middle Income"), "7", IMAGE("/resource/segment_color/segment_color/sgm07_min.svg", "Mass"), "Others"))
CustomField.label: Segment
